body: I'd have a pretty powerful djinn now if I get recjarged everytime I came. Anyway absolutely perfect doujin.

@HideriSurprise Kind of late for that, because I was reading Magic before the Adventure of Sinbad was announced, you can read Magic without reading Sinbad, just like how you can read Fate stay night or Fate/zero. And Magic already spoil the end of Sinbad.

@Natsu_1000 I recommend watching Adventure of Sinbad first before starting Labyrinth of Magic. It's nowhere near as good and imo isn't a great show, but it really builds up Sinbad's character which makes them look so much cooler in labyrinth and kingdom. You can always drop it if you don't like it.
@Natsu_1000 Go ahead, it's a good ride. And This doujin is surprisingly good.
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me
I seriously need to watch Magi already…
